description: During the [2016 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0025), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used heavily obfuscated code with [Industroyer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0604) in its Windows Notepad backdoor.(Citation: ESET Industroyer)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov. (2017, June 12). Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial controls systems. Retrieved December 18, 2020.
